info.title: VTEX Headless CMS
info.description:
The [VTEX Headless CMS](https://www.faststore.dev/docs/headless-cms-overview) is a solution for storefront content management.
You can use the Headless CMS API to fetch data about your project's pages and content types, including `status`, `id`, and `type`. 

 ## Index 

 ### Pages 
- `GET` [Get all Content Types](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/headless-cms-api#get-/_v/cms/api/-projectId-/)
- `GET` [Get all CMS pages by Content Type](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/headless-cms-api#get-/_v/cms/api/-projectId-/-content-type-)
- `GET` [Get CMS page](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/headless-cms-api#get-/_v/cms/api/-projectId-/-content-type-/-document-id-/)

**Servers**
- `https://{account}.myvtex.com/`
- `https://{workspace}--{account}.myvtex.com/`

| **Parameter name** | **Description** | **Type** |
| --------------- | ----------------- | ----------------- |
| {{accountName}} | Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL. | Server variable. |
| {{workspace}} | Name of the VTEX workspace. | Server variable. |
| {{projectId}} | Project ID specified in the settings of the CMS (alpha) app. | Path variable. |

accountName.description: Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL.
Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL.

workspace.description: Name of the VTEX workspace. Used as part of the URL.

get.description:
Retrieves data from all Content Types.

## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: Project ID specified in the settings of the CMS (alpha) app.

contentTypes.description: Array with data of each Content Type.

items.description: Object with data of a specific Content Type.

id.description: Content Type identifier specified in the FastStore project.

name.description: Content Type name specified in the FastStore project.

configurationSchemaSets.description: Array with data of the `configurationSchemaSets` tabs specified in the FastStore project.

items.description: Object with data about a specific Content Type tab.

name.description: Name of the Content Type tab.

configurations.description: Custom configurations of the Content Type tab, which may vary based on the Content Type schema defined in the FastStore project.

items.description: Object with custom configurations of the Content Type tab.

widget.description: [Widget](https://v1.faststore.dev/tutorials/cms-storecomponents/3#using-widgets) to be used in the UI. Should be filled with [`uiSchema`](https://react-jsonschema-form.readthedocs.io/en/docs/api-reference/uiSchema/) along with [`widgets`](https://react-jsonschema-form.readthedocs.io/en/docs/usage/widgets/) to specify which UI widget should be used to render a given field of your schema. The format should be `"{uiSchema}": "{widgetName}"`.

schema.title: Collection
schema.description: Definition of a Collection for the CMS.

categoryId.title: Category ID
categoryId.description: Category identifier to organize the store's products.

sort.title: Default ordering
sort.description: Organizes and displays a set of products based on filters.

brandId.title: Brand ID
brandId.description: Brand identifier to categorize a group of products.

sort.title: Default ordering
sort.description: Organizes and displays a set of products based on filters.

clusterId.title: Collection ID
clusterId.description: Collection identifier to categorize a group of products.

sort.title: Default ordering
sort.description: Organizes and displays a set of products based on filters.

title.title: Title
title.description: Title that appears in the browser tab and is suggested for search engines.

slug.title: URL slug
slug.description: Final part of the page's address. No spaces allowed.

description.title: Description (Meta description)
description.description: Suggested meta description for search engines.

title.title: Default page title
title.description: Display this title when no other title is available.

description.title: Meta tag description
description.description: Meta tag description. A HTML tag that provides a concise summary of a web page.
description.default: A beautifully designed site for general VTEX stores.

titleTemplate.title: Title template
titleTemplate.description: Title template to be used in category/product pages.

slug.title: URL Slug
slug.description: Part of the URL to identify a particular page or product.

get.summary: Get all CMS pages by content type
get.description:
Gets data from all pages of a given Content Type.

## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: Project ID specified in the settings of the CMS (alpha) app.

parameters.name: content-type
parameters.description: Content Type identifier defined in the FastStore project.

parameters.name: versionId
parameters.description: Version ID presented in the URL path of a CMS preview.

parameters.name: releaseId
parameters.description: Release ID presented in the URL path of a CMS preview.

parameters.name: filters[{field}]
parameters.description:
Filter results by a property of the page (e.g., `filters[status]`) or by a nested custom field of the `parameters` object (e.g., `filters[parameters.collection.sort]`).
*Replace {field} with the desired property.*

hasNextPage.description: Indicates if there are more items to fetch.

data.description: Array with data from all pages of the given Content Type.

items.description: Object with data from a specific page.

id.description: Document ID presented in the URL path of a CMS preview.

name.description: Name of the page created via the CMS interface.

type.description: Name of the Content Type defined in the FastStore project.

items.description: Object with data about a specific section.

data.description: Custom field values of the Section. Varies depending on the Section schema defined in the FastStore project.

parameters.description: Object with the configuration values of a `configurationSchemaSets` tab. Varies depending on the Content Type schema defined in the FastStore project.

get.description:
Gets all data from a given page.

## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: Project ID specified in the settings of the CMS (alpha) app.

parameters.name: content-type
parameters.description: Content Type ID defined in the FastStore project.

parameters.name: document-id
parameters.description: Document ID presented in the URL path of a CMS preview.

parameters.name: versionId
parameters.description: Version ID presented in the URL path of a CMS preview.

parameters.name: releaseId
parameters.description: Release ID presented in the URL path of a CMS preview.

data.caption: Enjoy and get 10% off on your first purchase!!

schema.description: Object containing the data related to a specific page.

name.description: Name of the page created in the CMS app.

type.description: Name of the Content Type defined in the FastStore project.

items.description: Object with data about a specific section.

data.description: Content of the Section. Varies depending on the Section schema defined in the FastStore project.
